message.body: This is working out so well!
Are you going in to the office today?
I decided to pick up my Dad's memoirs again yesterday :)
Right?! Yea I am
Lucky! Maybe I should read those at CFO haha
Haha one always thinks their will be down time and there usually isn't, but I can still bring them!
Well yea, but I may have time!
My Dad is gonna talk to the travel agent about whether we need to change our Brazil plans...
Did you like my snap?
Ooooo right. Why is that again? Also, not sure when we would go, but the living social kings dominion deal looks pretty good
Because of the protesting. Eek! Well Katie left...can't remember when she comes back. And it is basically up to her when her discernment process can include a double date haha
Haha true story.
Where is she going?
Madison. Oh actually it is just til Friday
Wisconsin?? Heck. Also, given that you now know the deodorant I use, the meme I just sent you should make more sense :)
Yep! That's where all the interns in the country will be
What a spot. Well that does mean she will see Jed
Yup it does! I havent gotten an update from her in the last several days
Mmk. Yea like the only time we could go conceivably would be the weekend in between CFO and my fam vacation. But that would be a bad idea
Bad idea why?
Because that would be a lot of things all smashed together. I mean maybe it could work
Right--i just think that it wouldn't actually work. We wouldn't have any time there if we are getting back from cfo at 3ish or even laterb
Yea I mean we would go Sunday but again that would be super ideal
Yea I don't think so :(
Yea. Maybe we can find a deal in August
I think that's what we will have to do!
Yea! How is your day going?
Good! Basically Im reading all day before gym and work. I still don't feel amazing :(
O no! Did you get to sleep at a decent time?
I woke up with no alarm at 9, so a good night's sleep but not tons
Oh whoops, that wasn't your question. I went to bed at 1 I think
Hmmm. Well you might just need more time to recover from the weekend. Watching these videos is damn near impossible right now btw
Does it really suck? :( I'm sorry--it is a whole lot of just one thing!
Yup. Its just really hard to get into it
I believe it! Just one more week though!
Yea but there is a lot I need to tear through this week
This is true.
My Dad's memoirs are so much about music and poetry and history. I shouldn't be surprised, but the fact that he wrote about college so many years after c
ollege makes the whole thing really nerdy. Haha but he is a great writer
Haha not surprised about that at all. Are you liking it?
Actually not as much as I had hoped. :/ I'm reading his piece on leaving the episcopal church and enjoying this one a lot more
Mmmm. I could def see how you would like that bette
Are you skipping around then?
Yea...took a break from the memoirs haha. But am halfway through the church thing!
Wait the church thing isn't part of the memoirs?
Nope! Separate document haha. The memoirs are about uva and berkeley
Grrr. Apparently Eli wants me to wait to come to Crico. Dang it
Oh shoot! Why is that, do you know? Until when?
Apparently he doesn't want me up there until I move. So. Sucks.
Frick :( what are we gonna do about housing for you?

Well, it means I will either have free time to travel back and check out places during the week while staying with aunt barbara, or I will have to wait until Michael gets back into town and just trust him to find something.
But it will be OK. Nice to now that we will still be in Boston at the same time

Yea that's true. It seems like either are viable options, especially if he keeps up with the video trend. Yea that's definitely an upside! Big time of transition for both of us and we can be there for each other more--I consider that a huge blessing :)
Exactly! And then that also means that by the time you get there I won't have everything figured out :P
Hey I'm going to run to the store to get boxes. Should be an adventure :)
